metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: • 1 beef roast (3 -4 pounds) • 2 cloves garlic, minced • 1 tablespoon fresh rosemary, chopped • 1 tablespoon fresh thyme, chopped • 1/4 cup olive oil • Salt and pepper to taste

• In a large pot, cook ground beef with diced onion and garlic over medium heat until browned. • Stir in kidney beans, diced tomatoes, tomato paste, beef broth, chili powder, cumin, and paprika. • Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minut es, stirring occasionally. • Season with salt and pepper. • Serve hot, garnished with shredded cheese and sour cream.

• Ingredients : o 1 block tofu o 1/4 cup cornstarch o 1 cup dashi broth o 2 tablespoons soy sauce o 1 tablespoon mirin o 1/4 cup green onions o 1/4 cup grated daikon • Instructions : o Cut tofu into cubes and coat with cornstarch. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Heat dashi broth with soy sauce and mirin. o Serve tofu in broth, topped with green onions and grated daikon.

• Ingredients : o 2 potatoes o 1 cauliflower o 1 small on ion o 2 cloves garlic o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon turmeric o 1 teaspoon coriander o 1 teaspoon garam masala o 1 teaspoon salt o 2 tablespoons oil • Instructions : o Peel and dice potatoes, cut cauliflower into florets. o Heat oil in a pan and sauté diced onion and minced garlic until translucent. o Add cumin, turmeric, coriander, and garam masala, cook for 1 minute. o Add potatoes and cauliflower, stir to coat with spices. o Cover and cook until vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally. o Add salt to taste and serve.

• Ingredients : o 1 cup rice o 1 cup coconut milk o 1 cup water o 1/4 cup shredded coconut o 1 teaspoon salt • Instructions : o Sauté shredded coconut until lightly browned. o Add rice, coconut milk, water, and salt. o Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until rice is tender. o Serve warm.
